Rat Trap could hear the door creak open, and is quick to dart behind a smal=
l power box, scrunching himself up into a fall of fur, while also alerting =
Windlord to the fact that there was someone on the other side, as he gestur=
es by putting his front paw in front of his comrade.

"Shhh... Someone's op=
ening the door."

For now before doing anything, he'd have to wait until so=
meone closed the door before he could make his move.

At the battle scene, =
Tucson focuses on what he has to do, but then, a flash back is quick to flo=
od his circuitry.  It was the day he feared that he had het his Autobot com=
rades down, by being taken off line suddenly during a horrific battle again=
st the Decepticons.  It was this fear of failure that he would stick to his=
 guns, literally and be sure that his comrades would NOT be failed once aga=
in!

He sticks close to Talon, and the others, trying his hardest to shield=
 them from harm.  It was something he thought he had failed to do so vorns =
ago.  His fear of losing the ones he cares about, now floods him.  Failure =
would not be an option for him, as he very much fears it.

" No Hydras, I w=
ill not fall to you now or ever again.  Failure to me is NOT an option!  I =
will NOT fail my faction or the Maximals! " 

He draws his sword, like a Kn=
ight facing a fierce dragon.  He circles Hydras, and then listens carefully=
 to his foot steps while wileding his blade masterfully.

Meanwhile, Night =
Shift's fear was simple, he had always had an aversion to oversized arachni=
ds.  Now, he sees a large spider's web from the corner of his eyes, and is =
quick to jump back away from it.

"WOAH SCRAP!  WHAT THE PIT?!  I AIN'T STE=
PPN' ANOTHER STEP FURTHER!  WHATEVER MADE THAT WEB'S GOTTA BE BIG, UGLY AND=
 BAD NEWS!"

Tucson listens.

" Night Shift, keep it together! "

Night Shi=
ft transforms and tries to back up.

"Uhh uhh, when it comes ta oversized s=
piders, I ain't gonna have anythn' ta do with it!"

Tucson narrows his opti=
cs.

"Oh no, Phobia... Night Shift, listen to me!  Everyone, listen to me! =
 Phobia has deployed a fear tactic!  You have to try your best to resist it=
!  It's the only way to shake it off!"

He then turns back to Hydras, and r=
emembers that if he did attack the predacon leader with a blade, and if he =
had managed to slice off a head, two more would grow back and what would be=
 the sense of doing that?

His fear of failure was still real, but his know=
ledge of old legends was still fresh in his directory.  The only way to sto=
p a Hydra, was to cast a flame upon it's body that was not its own.

Tucson=
 accesses his smaller blast cannons, and sets fire to a piece of fallen deb=
ris and takes it up into his hand like a torch.  It was a primative method =
of combat, but if legend still held true, it would ward Hydras off.  Hopefu=
lly.

"Slice one head off a hydra, and two grow back.  But cast a fire upon=
 it that is not its own, will indefinitely see to its demise...  Phobia may=
 have caused fear, but she had no idea that her effect on me, would actuall=
y inhibit me to resort to resourceful thinking rather than running away."

=
He now stands solid with the large torch in hand, waiting to see what Hydra=
s would do next.  This was it, a page right out of mythology.  The legend o=
f Hercules stuck solidly in his directory.  Having read something about it,=
 in his spare time as a regular Autobot, vorns ago, the story stuck well in=
 his mind, and now was coming in handy.  The legend itself depicted Hercule=
s facing the Hydra and finding that cutting off its head was not the way to=
 kill the beast.  But taking a torch to it would mean certain death for the=
 creature.  And he did just that, in the legend.  But Tucson's fear did spr=
ead beyond failure.  His fear of dishonoring his Autobot and Maximal comrad=
es was now apparent.  He was a Prime after all, and the Autobot way, was no=
t to take a life needlessly.  So, he remains perfectly still, torch in hand=
, facing Hydras with a brave face, but yet, afraid to do the final deed, in=
 fear of dishonoring his bretheren.  

Meanwhile, Night Shift gets back int=
o robot mode, and notices a lot of spider web material around him.  

"Grea=
t, more webs, more spiders...  I hate spiders."

Back at the Ark, Quickstri=
de suddenly realizes that his stinky surprise goes terribly wrong.

"Ooooop=
s.... I sooo didn't mean to do that....  Awww geeze, I meant ta hit whoever=
 it is that's spyn' on us, not you guys...  It's a good thing I carry an ox=
ygen reversal to my noxious attacks. "

From his mouth, he blows fresh oxyg=
en into the air, where he had let loose his cloud of gas, hoping that it wo=
uld help rather than harm the creatures around him.  All the while, still k=
eeping an ear out for danger.

> <NEW =96 Inside the Black Fortress>
> 
> Rat trap is easily able to=
 find a small panel low on the wall which would lead inside of it. It is sm=
all, but large enough that he could crawl inside of it while still in rat m=
ode to check it out. Inside the wall is dark, and many different types of c=
ables run along it of all different colors.
> 
> (OOC: I was not sure if yo=
u were going inside yet?)
> 
> One of the doors at the end of the hall beep=
ed, someone was preparing to open the door from the other side!
> 
> 
> <Me=
anwhile outside the Fortress>
> 
> The fire fight between the Maximals and =
the Predacons intensifies as all of the combatants come together in earnest=
! The sweeps come in laying down cover fire, strafing back and forth along =
the Maximal's lines, using their superior maneuverability and speed to cove=
r as many of them as possible.
> 
> Deepstryke maintains his distance, usin=
g his long ranged targeting ability to strike at the Maximals as he can.  
=
> 
> As Straight shot goes offline and Tuscon began to look around and disc=
uss tactics, Tuscon is wounded, the attack catching him in the shoulder. A =
brief look around shows that it was not one of the sweeps that had damaged =
him, or even Deepstryke, but none other than Hydras himself!
> 
> (OOC: Sin=
ce Hydras had said he attacked and Tuscon said he was wounded =96 I just st=
itched that together)
> 
> Talon and Kup continue to fire against Predacons=
 hoping to break the Box maneuver, but so far they are heavily out numbered=
 by the attacking forces.
> 
> Then a high pitched sound could be heard as =
something rocked through the air . . .
> 
> <THOOOM!!!>
> 
>               =
. . . A rocket shell hit the ground!
> 
> However instead of exploding to s=
end destructive forces in its wake, it began to emit a high pitched wine an=
d the Maximals and Autobots began to feel FEAR!!!!
> 
> (OOC: Yup, Phobia's=
 ability is like her name. Like rumble can create Earthquakes, she can crea=
te Fear in her opponents.  Basically it brings out the worst fears in her e=
nemies and attacks them with it.)
> 
> 
> 
> <At The Ark>
> 
> The noxious =
cloud of green gas hisses out, hot, steamy, and extremely FOUL! Even as it =
rose into the air enveloping a few trees as it began to expand to envelop m=
ore and more of the area in which it floated.
> 
> Soon several birds fall =
from their perch, hitting the ground with a thud! A squirrel quickly follow=
ed. However there was no sign of anyone else out there with Quickstride, he=
 was apparently alone.
> 
> Perhaps, who ever the attacker had been, had us=
ed the moment that Rodimus had stepped out of the shield to see about Quick=
stride, to step in it himself. What ever the case, there was no response fr=
om the ninja, if he was even still out there.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
